Title: Relates to driving a motor vehicle while under the influence of drugs, impairing substances or combined use of drugs and alcohol
Summary: Relates to driving a motor vehicle while under the influence of drugs, impairing substances or combined use of drugs and alcohol; defines the term "inhalant".
LawCode: Add ยง119-c, amd ยง1192, V & T L; amd ยง3380, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public health law, in relation to driving a motor vehicle under the influence of drugs or combined use of drugs, impairing substances and alcohol
